read <- function(n_phi) {
  corr <- readtextcf(paste0('/home/schlage/Master/R/correlators_',n_phi,'_phi_phi4p.tsv'), T = 24, skip = 4) # Hier muss angepasst werden!
  return(corr)
}

corr1 <- read(1)
corr2 <- read(2)
corr3 <- read(3)
corr4 <- read(4)
corr5 <- read(5)

#==============================#
# 1 particle corr:             #
#==============================#
uw1 <- uwerr.cf(corr1)
save(uw1, file = 'uw1.Rdata')
uw2 <- uwerr.cf(corr2)
save(uw2, file = 'uw2.Rdata')
uw3 <- uwerr.cf(corr3)
save(uw3, file = 'uw3.Rdata')
